definition: camp/barracks/battalion/to build/to operate/to manage/to strive for
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: According to sales picking cabinet shop, business management training staff.
sentences.chinese: 根据店柜销售情况配货，营业员管理培训。

sentences.english: As a shop-assistant, I met all kinds of people.
sentences.chinese: 作为一名营业员，我遇见过各种各样的人。

sentences.english: The associate told me how I should fill out the insurance form.
sentences.chinese: 营业员给我讲了应该怎么填保价单。

sentences.english: Assitant, please let the customer to try on this coat.
sentences.chinese: 营业员请那位顾客试穿一下这件大衣。

sentences.english: The sales agent dresses like a senior management when he goes to work.
sentences.chinese: 那个营业员打扮像一个高级管理人员般上班。

sentences.english: The assistant measured off a dress-length from the roll.
sentences.chinese: 营业员从衣料卷上量出够做一件连衣裙的料。

sentences.english: Go into a store and chat to a good-looking clerk
sentences.chinese: 到商店去，找一个漂亮的营业员，跟她聊几句。

sentences.english: Take the class salesperson blame him, because he left the store.
sentences.chinese: 搭班营业员埋怨他，因他离开商店后。

sentences.english: At one shop, the assistant almost laughed at her.
sentences.chinese: 在一家商店，营业员几乎嘲笑了她。

sentences.english: There was a new shop assistant standing behind the counter.
sentences.chinese: 柜台后面站着一个新来的营业员。

sentences.english: Shop ssistants in some state-run shops are frosty in manner, repelling customers from a distance.
sentences.chinese: 有些国营商店的营业员态度冷若冰霜，拒人千里之外。

sentences.english: Communicate with the shop assistant in English at a store.
sentences.chinese: 能够用英语在商店内和营业员进行交流。

sentences.english: The customer complained to the manager of the discourtesy of an assistant.
sentences.chinese: 顾客向经理控告一个营业员的失礼。

definition: variant of 櫃檯|柜台[gui4 tai2]
sales counter/front desk/bar/(of markets, medicines etc) OTC (over-the-counter)
variant of 櫃檯|柜台[gui4 tai2]
